page.title: 07Employment in Dunnington
page.content: From the 41 households who replied to our survey of occupations, we found that over two thirds had professional or managerial jobs. Although the area is predominantly rural, only one fifth of the respondants worked on the land. Occupations included 6 company directors, 5 teachers, a radiographer, a solicitor, a gamekeeper, a timber merchant, an educational psychologist, 7 people who work on the land and many other varied occupations. The largest local employer is Hillers at Dunnington Heath Farm. They employ 12 men and 15 women full time and at the height of the fruit picking season this number rises to 70 men and 95 women.
